resources.string: Set this switch to \'on\' if the server is only accessible from the current network (e.g the WiFi network you are connected to). Leave the switch \'off\' if the server is publicly accessible, i.e if you could access it from the same server address whilst connected to a different network.
Indicator that a connection to this server can be made
Indicator that a connection to this server cannot be made
Are you sure you want to delete this server? This action cannot be undone.
